name: Final Fantasy XIV: Futures Rewritten
summary: Patch 5.4 follows the Scions of the Seventh Dawn as they resume their adventures in the Source. This patch also brings a conclusion to Ryne and Gaia's journey in Eden's Promise. Other additions and refinements to the game include the next installment of the Sorrow of Werlyt quest series, the new Explorer Mode, and more!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV Patch 5.4 - Futures Rewritten
